detailed_goals: Finalize the statistical model for evaluating risk-return profiles of market-neutral funds.
Integrate historical performance data into the model for backtesting.
Prepare a report summarizing findings for the investment team.
Complete the onboarding checklist for UHNWIs.
Schedule and conduct introductory meetings with prospective clients.
Ensure all KYC/AML documentation is collected and verified.
Launch personalized email campaigns targeting UHNWIs.

Conduct internal training on updated regulatory requirements.
Ensure all KYC/AML processes are fully operational.

Develop visualizations for competitor performance metrics.
Present findings to the investment team for strategy adjustments.
Finalize technical requirements for fund management software.
Review and approve backend development plans.
Ensure API integrations are aligned with frontend development.
Conduct risk assessments for fund operations.
Review internal controls and compliance checks.
Prepare audit reports for regulatory submission.

Prepare a detailed report on model performance.
Review progress on all project timelines.
